summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 KIA SOUL. THE CONTACT STATED THAT  THE CHECK ENGINE INDICATOR FLASHED, THERE WAS A DRASTIC REDUCTION IN SPEED, AND THE VEHICLE STALLED INTERMITTENTLY NUMEROUS TIMES. THE MANUFACTURER ADDED THE VEHICLE TO NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V120000 (ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING) ON APRIL 16, 2019; HOWEVER, THE VEHICLE WAS UNABLE TO BE SAFELY DRIVEN. A DEALER HAD NOT DIAGNOSED THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
